column3: @Diapolo Indeed, that's what it should do :)\n
@sipa What about an information, what the current sync node is? Perhaps in getinfo or getpeerinfo (isSyncNode or something) RPC?\n
I think that can be added to getpeerinfo, indeed.\n

@jgarzik To comment on a remark you made in another pullreq: this patch effectively only uses the scoring mechanism when the current sync node goes away, even though it may not be the "node in practice being synced from" anymore. When IBD is complete, and a node (different from the designated sync node) announces a new block, we will fetch it from him. This patch does not switch the sync node to t
